email_001.json.summary: Urgent SAE report for patient 101-005 hospitalized for pneumonia in DNLI-123 study, with CRO coordinating sponsor response and next steps.
quickActions: Acknowledge receipt and confirm 24-hour reporting timeline met
Request source documents and hospital discharge summary
Forward to Medical Monitor and Safety team with urgency flag

email_002.json.summary: Scheduling coordination for Q3 2024 Interim Monitoring Visit at Site 101, with site requesting alternative dates due to PI vacation.
quickActions: Confirm August 26-28 availability with site coordinator
Send calendar invite and monitoring visit agenda

email_003.json.summary: Urgent follow-up on 30+ outstanding data queries for DNLI-001 study at Site 305 approaching database lock deadline.
quickActions: Log into EDC and pull query resolution report for Site 305
Schedule urgent call with site to review blockers
Escalate to clinical operations manager if needed

email_004.json.summary: Critical protocol deviation report for double-dose administration error at Site 102, requiring immediate medical monitor assessment and guidance.
quickActions: Acknowledge receipt and escalate to Medical Monitor immediately
Verify protocol deviation form is complete in eTMF
Provide site with next steps and safety monitoring guidance

email_005.json.summary: Temperature excursion notification for investigational product refrigerator at Site 101, requiring sponsor guidance on product viability and quarantine procedures.
quickActions: Confirm quarantine procedures completed correctly
Forward temperature logs to David Lee for stability assessment
Respond to site once viability decision is made

email_006.json.summary: Follow-up on outstanding monitoring visit action items requiring updated delegation log and training documentation for new sub-investigator.
quickActions: Review Dr. Peterson training certificates in eTMF
Send reminder for signed Delegation Log by EOD tomorrow

email_007.json.summary: Protocol clarification query regarding acceptable liver function test ranges for healthy volunteer screening in DNL-123 Part A study.
quickActions: Review protocol Section 5.2 exclusion criteria
Draft clarification memo citing specific protocol language
Send response to site and CRO with medical monitor approval

email_008.json.summary: Proactive recruitment support outreach for FTD cohort enrollment challenges, offering sponsor assistance and scheduling call to discuss strategies.
quickActions: Send meeting invite for Tuesday or Thursday afternoon
Review Site 123 screening logs and pre-screen funnel
Prepare recruitment materials and resources to share

email_009.json.summary: Missing IRB approval letter for Protocol Amendment 4 in eTMF causing delay in periodic Trial Master File review milestone.
quickActions: Search email for IRB approval letter from Site 101
Upload document to eTMF regulatory section if found
Follow up with site if document not yet received

email_010.json.summary: Site query about Open-Label Extension visit schedule and procedures for participant 101-005 approaching Week 25 visit and interested in continuing study.
quickActions: Forward OLE consent form and Part C visit schedule to site
Clarify eligibility criteria from protocol Section 7.3
